website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive set is a good choice for people setting up their first kitchen. They work well and fit nearly any budget.
pros: Tines  have a little give, making them perfect for complicated recipes
Loop on the end allow hanging on a kitchen hook
cons: Tines tend to be a little flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Weak, lightweight, and cheap, hollow garbage that fills with water.
customer_reviews.text: There must be some sort of conspiracy going on that this has THAT many positive reviews. Buy something else, THESE ARE HORRIBLE. I bought these as a gift for my girlfriend and upon even picking up the package, I knew there was something not right with these. They are so awful that I can't even give them as a little gift..I would be embarrassed at giving these as a gift. These are literally hollow..and EXTREMELY lightweight. This is almost like a joke, it is that bad. I'm serious when I tell you to avoid these despite the glowing reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Might have been a 5 star review
customer_reviews.text: I wash my dishes by hand and then put them in the drainer. These whisks retain the water in the handle when placed whisk side up in my drainer. If they had designed drainage in the handle, these things may have been great. Nothing like dirty dishwater in the handle to turn you off on a product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Huot

customer_reviews.title: They fill up with water, even hand washed
customer_reviews.text: I returned these, I guess you get what you pay for. lesson learned. I usually trust Amazon's Choice, this one was a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Txevey

customer_reviews.title: I should have picked someting else. Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: It was mailed in a bubble pack. Many of the folded wires were just sticking out. 100% defected, I do not recommend this item. I waited too long to return, but wanted other to know in hopes they don;t go through this. Maybe the seller/Mfg. might send replacement, if they do, and it's arrives undamaged, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: LOGOSYS

customer_reviews.title: Good whisk set :)
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, just 3 different sized whisks. I usually leave a few paragraphs review giving the pros and cons of products on amazon, but there's not much to this... So here goes... PROS 3 different sizes = the right size for the job stainless steel = easy to clean CONS no color selection no wifi no gps lol, just kidding. There are no CONS to these whisks that I have found yet. If I do, I will update my review. Go ahead and buy these if you want a good whisk set :)
customer_reviews.author: CastleTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Kinda flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: They’re ok.:: just flimsy. I can see thrm bending and losing shape easily. So I’m careful with them. Which is a bit of a nuisance Bc I want to beat stuff with them. But like my kids or my husband, but like ... eggs or batter.
customer_reviews.author: TLee

customer_reviews.title: It wisks just like a wisk should
customer_reviews.text: Its a wisk. It wisks just like a wisk should; just as I expected a wisk would wisk. I needed a new wisk that would wisk as I cooked. These wisks have been good wisks and I enjoy wisking with them. If you need a wisk for wisking, these are good wisks. My kids enjoy wisking with these wisks as well. Family wisking all around. These wisks have helped us be a family of wiskers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely into my hand. I received another whisk set for Christmas from Williams Sonoma, but honestly, these are my favorite. The Williams Sonoma set had skinnier handles, so I felt I had to grip it more and my hand became more tired easily.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't kill you but definitely not improving your health.
customer_reviews.text: Might want to pass on these. I've been an Amazon prime customer for 7yrs and this is my first 1 star rating. I didn't like them from the start. The wire end, especially in the largest, bent very easily. Not long after having them, one got a hole in it. So I decide to start pulling them apart, knowing that there must be stuff trapped in there. There definitely was. Black and brown/orange on all of them. Even the one without a visible hole. I thought maybe I could just remove the silicone and use them without but they are definitely rusting. In the trash they go.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love these whisks! They are well made and sturdy. The handle is thick enough to allow a good grip! There’s no weird holes where the wires enter the handle so it doesn’t store water and in the handle. I would definitely recommend these and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Erick S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the cost
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is that water gets into the handles through the holes at the top. So don’t stand them right side up in the dish washer. But aside from that I easily recommend them for quality
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!!!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing all these reviews, the majority of them seems to have liked them. I can't see how. The whisk are not sturdy, one of them showed up at my house out of shape, and you can only whisk thing that are light, like eggs. I seriously would not recommend these to anyone. You are better off buying them from the store where you can make sure that they are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Johnson

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY & SILICONE COMES OFF/APART
customer_reviews.text: Well, you get your money's worth with this set. Less than 3 months after purchasing them, the silicone is coming off/apart from the steel whisks. The whisks are also very flimsy and bend very easily. Whisking anything heavier than eggs is next to impossible as they simply bend and de-form quickly. I do NOT recommend buying these, even for light use.
customer_reviews.author: james b.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't waste my money on these. One of them the coating came off of after the first use so makes is useless on my non stick pans. They have to be dried wire side down because the handles retain water and get moldy inside. Not worth the hassle or the health risk.
customer_reviews.author: SEE III

customer_reviews.title: Great Whisks
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have much hope for these because they where so cheap. I thought for sure they would fall apart. However, it turned out just fine. They are great and the multiple sizes are great for small bowls. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They lasted longer than the girlfriend they were bought for
customer_reviews.text: This design is always annoying to clean, but that is the only complaint I can come up with. They still work fine a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Voyles

customer_reviews.title: Might be my worst purchase yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is beyond bad. I have never seen a whisk that can rust. I haven’t even used it once. I washed it When I received it and it rusted. I was disappointed with it as soon as I opened the package. It’s cheap and feels like a children’s toy.
customer_reviews.author: Aleta

customer_reviews.title: Arrived all safe and sound. Washed them and used ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived all safe and sound. Washed them and used them a few times and then they fell apart in the middle of cooking. I had read that on a few other reviews before I purchased but thought I would take the chance. Wish I hadn't.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannene

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were a bit sturdier, drain the handles after washing.
customer_reviews.text: I wish these were a bit sturdier. They work fine, but they give a little more than a solid metal wisk would. I wanted silicone so I could use these in my enamel Dutch oven, so I'm happy with that aspect. Also, when these go through the dishwasher, they come out with water in the handle. Just make sure to turn them over and drain that out each time so it doesn't flow out into your food when you go to use them. (Happened!)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Barr

customer_reviews.title: Not watertight
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, they are not watertight. The handles fill with water if you soak them or put them in a dishwasher, and then you have to stand over the sink and shake them out for two minutes. Going to get rid of these and get something made better.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Overall okay with this  product
customer_reviews.text: Pro: won’t rust since it is silicone so no worry of rust contaminating food. Smaller whisks seem sturdy. Works as one would expect a handheld whisk to work and gets the job done. Con: large whisk got bent out of shape really easily, especially when a toddler played with it. If washing in dishwasher in the utensil rack water gets stuck inside of the handle. Found its best to lay on its side in the dishwasher and hange upside down to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rust on the inside of the handle contaminates food
customer_reviews.text: These whisks develop rust on the inside of the handle that will contaminate your food if the inside of the handle is not 100% dry when you use it, as rusty water will come out when using it. There are small gaps where the wires join the handle, so water comes in when washing them, it's impossible to avoid. This inevitably rusts the inside of the handle and rusty water will come out. Came to find this out the hard way as I was mixing pancake batter and a couple of drops, of rust smelling water, came out of it into the batter.
customer_reviews.author: Arya

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Flimsy, Hard to Clean.
customer_reviews.text: Must be the flimsiest whisk I’ve ever held. Don’t bother trying to whisk batter because the tines will just bend with the batter. They’re so thin they don’t even fit the holes in the handle which is why water gets in but doesn’t drain out properly. Not worth the already cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay much attention to the product description! Otherwise, a reasonable product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm reasonably impressed with the price and quality of the Ouddy silicone & stainless whisk set. My only real concern is the product description: -says dishwasher safe and any time you put silicone through a dishwasher cycle you're decreasing its longevity -says microwave safe and these MUST ABSOLUTELY NOT EVER GO IN THE MICROWAVE -they are heat resistant but definitely will still melt if exposed to constant heat for more than a few moments (not for making gravy or syrups) -the description almost seems like they're talking about a few different products? All in all, they're reasonable for the price but aren't as amazing as they make them out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Handles come off
customer_reviews.text: They work fine as whisks but it didn't take long for the handles to start coming apart from the whisk part. It's easy enough to put back on but a bit of a pain when it comes off while cooking. Water can also get trapped in the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 are ok.
customer_reviews.text: Two out of the three are ok. The middle size one retained water after cleaning...which splashed out while I tried to use it...which is super gross. That one will get thrown away. There isn’t a way to open it to drain water.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but don't last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in March 2016 and had to throw them out less than 4 months later. They look nice and are good at whisking but they are poorly designed. The wires easily come loose and separate from the handle. This happens mostly while washing the whisks. About 3 months after using them I started to notice the handle rusting. I decided to throw them out shortly after when I was cooking and noticed some of the rust water dripping out of the handle into my food. I am very disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL B. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: A really great set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Theses whisks are very well built and sturdy. The handles are very nice and feel good. I really like using this set. Mostly, I use the middle sized whisk, the yellow one. It's the perfect size for all around use!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch E.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these at two different times. I bought one for myself because I do a lot of baking and the ones I had were getting really old, so i thought I'll just give these a try. Loved it and I love that there are different sizes. Although I only use two of the 3 sizes mainly. I then bought another one to be placed at my boyfriend's. Pretty sturdy so far and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: We will see
customer_reviews.text: I had some like this before and the handle had came unglued. I needed the different sizes and didn’t want to pay to much. Worth it for the price and the time they last I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Very balanced, easy on the wrist
customer_reviews.text: Well I wanted a set of Stainless steel wisk to help me make sauces. This does the job.
customer_reviews.author: JAHMAKER

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Super bendy. Not good for mixing anything thicker than water. Just plastic, not plastic coated metal. And now the whisk is coming out of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Careful when washing...
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors but first time washing the yellow one, the wisk piece came out. I was able to slide it back in the hole but the quality isn't the best compared to cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sjones-NH

customer_reviews.title: Whisks
customer_reviews.text: This is what I thought I wanted, but they're not going to lat long. I thought I wanted the coated whisk, but I wouldn't get them again. I would go for the metal. My granddaughter likes to play with them though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Holds water in the handle and then leaks into food
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a one for overall because when you wash them they hold water inside which then leaks into whatever you’re cooking later. This can’t be sanitary. It just holds water inside the handle which I’m sure molds and whatever else. I was so excited about this product but wouldn’t buy it again and mine have since been trashed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Clark

customer_reviews.title: Mold Maker
customer_reviews.text: As many people have said. the handle fills with water every time you wash it. its just kinda gross thinking mold can live in there. Also they are a bit on the flimsy side. spend money on a better set and don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Chase Jr

customer_reviews.title: Did what I needed
customer_reviews.text: 3 stainless steel whisks. They all worked just fine and without any instruction.
customer_reviews.author: HDP

customer_reviews.title: One came apart
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these to replace one that was coming apart, that I got for a dollar. But I have one that's doing the same stupid thing. VERY disappointed... VERY VERY disappointed. I wouldn't be surprised if they were the ones I got for a dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mcfalls

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This was a really great deal for 3 different sizes of whisks. I use them for everything. I especially love the small one, because I can use it with smaller bowls and the liquid doesn't fly all over the place. I like the quality of them too. They look and feel a lot like my mom's higher end ones without the higher end price tag. They have been through the wash many times and are still shiny as ever.
customer_reviews.author: melrom

customer_reviews.title: Whisks
customer_reviews.text: These are just fine for life stuff but they are rather floppy, the wires won't do you any favors if you're whisking up cream or chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: HarksGirl

customer_reviews.title: Water collects in handles
customer_reviews.text: These are not the worst whisks I have had, but they are not the best either. When I wash them water collects in the handle and then proceeds to leak out in my utensil drawer. They should be able to last a few more weeks but I wouldn't be surprised if one in the set breaks before too long.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Seagren

customer_reviews.title: Great for Whipping or Stirring
customer_reviews.text: I have had a set of these for many years and loved them. But the hubby used one to stir some oily stuff so I needed new ones. I am so glad they are still available! They are perfect for stirring or whipping either hot or cold food, drinks, mixes, just about anything you'd need a good action type stirring instrument for! Much better then a plain spoon!
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Navarijo

customer_reviews.title: Food doesn't gt stuck in these
customer_reviews.text: I make soups with chopped up veggies and herbs and with a few taps items come right out. Easy to clean and retains shape after many uses.
customer_reviews.author: MARIAH R CANTERBURY

customer_reviews.title: Fun whisks
customer_reviews.text: This is part of a birthday gift for a grandniece who loves to cook. They are fun colors and seem like they will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W.Wood

customer_reviews.title: Handy whisks that have held up well.
customer_reviews.text: Handy whisks that have held up well. They are a bit more flexible than my other whisks, but sometimes that is just the "feel" I need for a particular recipe. The smallest whisk comes in handy for whisking together dry indredients. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D-M-R

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These work okay, but not "pro" quality. Wire whisks are super thin. Handles don't feel very sturdy. For occasional use...great. For heavy use, get something else.
customer_reviews.author: RopeMan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little tools
customer_reviews.text: I love kitchen gadgets. These are well made and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: KarenR

customer_reviews.title: For the money it's great
customer_reviews.text: I was worried these were junk but they all work great and for the money I was too concerned if any broke... but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Pittie

customer_reviews.title: but they are excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: These were inexpensive so I didn't expect much from them, but they are excellent for the price. I use these directly in my nonstick pans. I've used the large one for making toffee (which gets extremely hot) and the small one for making sauces. I've only had them for a few weeks, but so far they have held up and not as flimsy as some other reviews may lead you to believe. They are flexible, but hold up nicely even while making thicker caramel candy type recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Mondor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; nice handles
customer_reviews.text: While the wire is not quite as stout as I wanted, these whisks have proven to be very nice. Easily handles thick batter and easy to hold and clean. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: ... arrived in a timely manner and appeared to be nice. However
customer_reviews.text: The whisks arrived in a timely manner and appeared to be nice. However, the first time using one, one of the whisks pieces fell out of the whisk. I would not recommend these as they do not appear to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for people with nice cookware. Not as stiff as metal ones, marginally. Super easy to clean and wont mark up pans. Larger hanging holes for pan racks would be perfection.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but not top quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is decent for the price, and worth having as extra whisks. But quality is far below that of more expensive whisks so these may not last very long
customer_reviews.author: Beeblebrox

customer_reviews.title: Pain
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to use and clean, however water gets into the handle so the next time you use it for mixing, water leaks out. After washing I have to put it upside-down for extra drying time
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Great size options. Sometimes I will use all three in a day. Great buy. Threw my other broken whisks out.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Moses

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy - Wire guage is 1/2 of the one I replaced
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy wire guage - roughly 1/2 the stiffness of the wire whisk I replaced - doubt if it will work well for anything stiffer than egg whites.
customer_reviews.author: Guy who loves to shop...

customer_reviews.title: Holes between handle and whisk that trap food and cant clean out.
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the handle it has holes where food and gunk can get trapped in the handle and you cant clean out. GROSS! If you want a product you cant clean properly then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Random

customer_reviews.title: Silicone whisk set
customer_reviews.text: All 3 silicone whisks look to be decent quality. Great for all our ceramic cooking surface cookware like Le Creuset, Staub, etc
customer_reviews.author: matt cecil

customer_reviews.title: Steel is too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The steel is too thin and the whisks flop and bend. The metal is not strong enough to last and cannot handle thick batter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ouddy stainless steel whisk 3 set
customer_reviews.text: ouddy 3 piece whisk set. Not strong enough for what I wanted so I am returning them. The smallest is only strong enough for a vinaigrette in my opinion. The largest whisk the wires bend very easily. Not as many wires as I would like to start with and what there is in the item - they are not strong. Will just buy the pampered chef small one.
customer_reviews.author: MRAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday whisk set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set of three whisks in order to get the largest whisk of the three. I already have one each of the two smaller whisks. They work well. I needed a whisk that would mix a larger quantity, but didn't have too many layers of wire. Too many layers trap thicker material in the middle of the whisk. This one does not. However, the wires don't feel really strong, so be careful if mixing a thick batch of cookies or brownies.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Good value and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and effective. Nice to get 3 sizes in the pack. Be careful for rust tho because these will rust if neglected.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety of sizes. All three are used a lot!! Solid and sturdy. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. Not a lot of money but handy. The largest one is a bit flimsy, but they're nice for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Justice

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a chef and these are pretty much the same types of whisks we use at work. After my beloved whisk broke, I decided to purchase these and I am so glad that I did. The range in sizes has definitely made it easier for me to whisk things in small bowls as opposed to using a fork. I would highly recommend these whisks!
customer_reviews.author: ItsAMeKristigi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of sizes. My toddler loves the small size to help me mix.
customer_reviews.author: ECM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect selection
customer_reviews.text: Great sizes for any chore. You can “whisk” through any task. Great quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: judith backman

customer_reviews.title: Not quality as described
customer_reviews.text: These all fell apart within a couple weeks, and rusted in the dishwasher. 10/10 would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Great for Easter Eggs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use as egg holders in Easter egg dye cups. You hard-boil the eggs and then shove them inside the whisk so your kids don't get dye everywhere. Worked well for that purpose except the little whisk was too small to hold an egg.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy_Pants_Rants

customer_reviews.title: Great Whisks
customer_reviews.text: These whisks are so much better for my non stick pans they do not scratch them up.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Stores water in handle
customer_reviews.text: The whisks are easy to use and lightweight, but the handle stores water when you wash them. Do you have to remember even if you store them upside down, you have to check and make side there is no water in the handle
customer_reviews.author: nicki phipps

customer_reviews.title: Great for nonstick pans!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. They have held up to several uses and the dishwasher so far. Glad I found these at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: flimsy product, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, was undamaged, and looked good. However, these whisks are very flimsy, making their performance poor and making them difficult to clean. I have an old Kitchen Aid whisk that is well made and durable but I wanted a variety of sizes. Will purchase Kitchen Aid again in the future and give these whisks away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Wisk
customer_reviews.text: Well, they wisk! They're not anything super fancy and occasionally the wires will pop out of the bottom, but for the price, its not bad. I bought them quite a while ago and they've held up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe K

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't thrilled with the colors, but they didn't have a plain color. But more important because of the material it is not as strong as a traditional wire whisk. Some of my pans you shouldn't use metal utensils on, so this was why I purchased these. It may work on thinner sauces, but the thicker ones it is challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Mr/Mrs

customer_reviews.title: I was really disappointed in the gauge and quality of these whisks
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in the gauge and quality of these whisks. After reading the reviews I thought they would work well in our church kitchen but they are pretty flimsy and not very strong for what we need them for. They will work fine for other smaller cooking things.
customer_reviews.author: 4ksuwildcats

customer_reviews.title: Rusted!
customer_reviews.text: They all rusted within a week! They are sturdy and strong, but developed rust spots within a week of having them. Edit: Ouddy, the seller, gave me a coupon for another set for free. We'll see how this set fairs but definitely a great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good set of whisk
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for some good whisk set and this one lives up to its reputation. Used it for more than a month now and is great. Works well. Clean up is easy and isn't rusting. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area Cooler

customer_reviews.title: Weak Whisk Strands
customer_reviews.text: The metal strand gauge is small and they are not sturdy. Ok for the price I guess, but if I would have been able to see these in a store, I would not have purchased them. A whisk needs to have thicker gauge for the strands so they don't bend and distort.
customer_reviews.author: jr sugalski

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: flimsy! Did not work well when whisking a roux with just flour and butter. I felt like it was going to break.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: A Little Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The whisks are nice and work well, but not very sturdy. One out of the three bent very quickly, and I don't use them for anything heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: VA

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job...
customer_reviews.text: ...Better than tne bulky plastic/rubber bulkier types. I've never had one of these pull apart.
customer_reviews.author: GDoC63

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of wisks.
customer_reviews.text: All my old wisks disappeared(son. or girlfriend. So I ordered these and like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handles Hold Water
customer_reviews.text: The whisks were flimsier than I expected, but the biggest issue I have is that the handles retain water in their handle (from both dishwashing and hand washing).
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Water in handle
customer_reviews.text: Water gets in handle when cleaning makes drying difficult. Otherwise they are nice
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Thin and useless
customer_reviews.text: If walls could talk.. haha.. this thing is Chinese junk. useless wires will bend in heavy batter.. no good at all
customer_reviews.author: Bens Owner

customer_reviews.title: I liked that there were different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I liked that there were different sizes, especially the smaller one. The handle is a little thicker than the one I was replacing, which was good, I am able to get a much better grip. The tines were not as substantial as I had expected, but they will surely do the job. I'm glad I got them on sale for the Amazon Daily Deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Get addition to your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this whisk set to replace my metal whisk. I only needed one, but the price was so good, I went for the set. Works really well. Like having the size options. The small size is perfect for just about everything.
customer_reviews.author: Christina G

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They look attractive and work just fine. I've been putting them in the dishwasher after each use, and had them for a month or so now, and they look like brand new. I would wish only for a set that included one larger, and one smaller to complete what I use in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Birkett

customer_reviews.title: Fair for the price metal wire whisks.
customer_reviews.text: They are okay for the price. They were not packaged well so they sort of came bent. But it is wire so over time they will be fine and I'm sure they will hold up. I mean for the price of 3 different whisks of different sizes what can you expect? They do look to be stainless and i like the loops at the ends if you have to hang them.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Light weight however whisking wires very thin!
customer_reviews.text: These whisks are working fine for the moment. However, where the whisking wires fit up into the handle is not sealed. I expect over time this will cause a rust problem. I do not put them in the dishwasher but have learned to stand them up with the handle up in the draining tray. Otherwise, when you go to use the whisk again, you will be throwing water everywhere, coming out of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely on non stick
customer_reviews.text: Want to extend the life of my non stick pans and crock pot so got these to be able to whisk foods in pan w/ out scratching. So far so good.Like the variation in sizes which fit my different size pans.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great find.
customer_reviews.text: I have nonstick pans that I didn't want to risk scratching. I ordered these with the intention of using them in our cookware. But I find that these are my new go to whisks. They work so well and are so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah L. Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: There are very useful in my kitchen and look very solid so far
customer_reviews.text: Use these every day. There are very useful in my kitchen and look very solid so far. great purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Sirene

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Once you put them in the dishwasher once they start to tarnish.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgieanneP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars... Oh wait, nope!
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a fair price.ETA: Knocked down several starts. I have not had these all that long, and they have literally just fallen apart. I am not an abuser of my kitchen utensils either. Buy a different brand and save the money.
customer_reviews.author: idateacher2Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend them, especially based on the price
customer_reviews.text: these are cheap whisk but worth the money. They're cheap enough that you can take them with you (I do some catering) and if I lose it - so be it. They hold up well enough for BBQ sauce and such. They might be a little to thin for extremely thick sauces. I would recommend them,especially based on the price.
customer_reviews.author: LynnTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Easy to hold and clean and love it held up
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Arpin

customer_reviews.title: cheap, will buy better next
customer_reviews.text: broken too soon. cheaply made, wire came loose within a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Durability issues
customer_reviews.text: The whisk part removes from the handle after having for a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: mrhargro

product_meta.title: Ouddy 3 Pack Stainless Steel Whisks 8"+10"+12", Wire Whisk Set Kitchen wisks for Cooking, Blending, Whisking, Beating, Stirring
feature_bullets: STRONG & DURABLE: Our kitchen wisks set is made of high quality durable stainless steel and highly-polished processing method. Ergonomically designed for excellent balance and control-for a difference you can really feel in the hand.

EASY TO CLEAN & STORAGE: Our stainless steel whisk set can be washed by dishwasher! The stainless steel ends allow for easy hanging on any hook in your kitchen, allowing for easy storage. A must-have for home cooks and restaurant chefs. (Please hang vertically after cleaning to avoid get water in the handle and rust.)

MULTIFUNCTIONAL: Our wisks for cooking makes cooking much easier and more enjoyable. Try the largest wire whisk for big bowls of pancake batter, the midsize wire whisk for beating eggs, and the littlest wire whisk for blending a small batch of vinaigrette.

FLEXABLE: Our wisk set come in 3 sizes - 12 inch, 10 inch, and 8 inch. This three piece kitchen wisks utensil set will blend in well when you're trying to outfit your kitchen with everything you need to keep your chef at home happy as can be.

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We are so confident in the quality of our product that you'll love it. If for any reason you are unsatisfied, simply contact us to return the stainless steel whisks set for a FULL Refund or Replacement. Just click add to cart on this page to get yours NOW!
